channel.title: Nexon-World |Since 2011 | 30+ Bosses | 50+ Train locations | Random Events | 24h
channel.description:
Nexon-World - Since 2011
Webclient/Play Now: http://www.nexon-world.enjin.com/playnow
Download Nexon-World: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52228169/Nexon-World.jar Main website: http://www.nexon-world.enjin.com
-TRAILER- http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ITU72VXW9lY
Welcome to play, we hope you join we have a lot to offer.
-What we have- All of the special weapons has a special attack, that works and is 100% perfect. A insane PvP system for pkers. A really huge server with over 40+ players always. We are very huge, we got many locations to go. (over 150). We have very friendly staffs, moderators that are always ready to help. We have ALL SKILLS WORKING, Except dungeoneering of course. We have RAIDs which means you must have 4 people party to start a RAID Boss slaying. You will gain RAID points. We have OVER 30 Bosses in Nexon-World, this means PvM is fun Revevant cave, its wildy and made just like in RuneScape. 24/7 VPS hosted dedicated server, without no fear of lag. It's really nice to play without afraiding of lag. A lot more, come to check youself the rest!
MEDIA: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/hrh9gy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/5pfxw8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/65dekn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/mcgbc4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/900uw7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/5b4u55.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/wi0in4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/v46jow.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2u5c87q.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/158bg3o.png[/img]
Webclient/Play Now: http://www.nexon-world.enjin.com/playnow
Download Nexon-World: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52228169/Nexon-World.jar Main website: http://www.nexon-world.enjin.com [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/5pmlw6.png[/img]

item.description:
@MentiosRSPS wrote:

Nexon-World - Since 2011

Webclient/Play Now: http://www.nexon-world.enjin.com/playnow

Download Nexon-World: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52228169/Nexon-World.jar
Main website: http://www.nexon-world.enjin.com

-TRAILER-

Welcome to play, we hope you join we have a lot to offer.

-What we have-
All of the special weapons has a special attack, that works and is 100% perfect.
A insane PvP system for pkers.
A really huge server with over 40+ players always.
We are very huge, we got many locations to go. (over 150).
We have very friendly staffs, moderators that are always ready to help.
We have ALL SKILLS WORKING, Except dungeoneering of course.
We have RAIDs which means you must have 4 people party to start a RAID Boss slaying. You will gain RAID points.
We have OVER 30 Bosses in Nexon-World, this means PvM is fun
Revevant cave, its wildy and made just like in RuneScape.
24/7 VPS hosted dedicated server, without no fear of lag. It’s really nice to play without afraiding of lag.
A lot more, come to check youself the rest!
